item.description:
Meet, socialize, have fun, and learn how to enjoy a non raw vegan event and venue as a raw vegan. Order raw pineapple, raw bean sprouts, and/or raw veggies with a little olive oil and soy sauce on the side and/or bring in raw fruit (ie: avocado, banana, dates, tomato, etc.) to add to dish or eat mono, and/or eat earlier, and/or go to adjacent Market Basket and buy raw fruit and veggies to snack on at about 7:30pm before the karaoke. (Just let me know.) Water is good. Wine is raw. Bring your raw vegan friends and non raw vegan friends too. "If you think you can sing it .... bring it!" Exercise your vocal chords (sing along), abdominal muscles (laugh), and body (dance)! I realize this event is an hour train ride from Boston but if you have learned something from reading this it was worth my effort posting it and it will be cool if even one other person shows up for some fun. :) MaraMore.com

C, S, N, & Y: Woodstock (J. Mitchell) Karaoke

The Human Revolution: Breathe

Raw Food Freedom: Bananas and Dates
item.name: Karaoke Raw-Vegan Style :)
